summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal sewerage utility of the City and amending Sections 3, 4, 5, 9 & 11 of and adding Section 4.1 to Ordinance 84390, to revise and increase sewerage rates and charges to pay sewage disposal charges due the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle and to finance additions and betterments to the city utility and to pay maintenance, operation, taxes and other charges of said City utility.
